  • Constructor Details

    • Moons

      public Moons​(int moonDistance, double moonAngle, int moonDiameter, java.lang.String moonColor, int moonCentreOfRotationDistance, double moonCentreOfRotationAngle, double moonSpeed, double planetSpeed)
      Moon Constructor
      Parameters:
      moonDistance - - Distance From the planet it is orbiting
      moonAngle - - Angle of the moon from the sun
      moonDiameter - - Diameter of the moon
      moonColor - - Color of the moon
      moonCentreOfRotationDistance - - Adds a small amount of distance so the moon isnt inside the planet
      moonCentreOfRotationAngle - - CentreOfRotationAngle - The angle around the planet the moon is orbiting
      moonSpeed - - Speed of moon (Orbit speed of the planet)
      planetSpeed - - Planet Speed the moon is orbiting - Needed for angle update

    • move

      public void move()
      Move method which is overwritten The angle is constantly being upadted to keep up with the planet it is orbiting Center of rotation angle is also updated so it spins around the planet at its own velocity
      Overrides:
      move in class Planets
